Row.Text: Fairies Cause Trouble
Some of the fairies that occupy the wild parts of the forest have been causing trouble near {1_City}, playing pranks upon citizens and merchants. Something must be done about this![NEWLINE]
They're harmless! Leave the fairies alone.
Send out some troops to drive them off as a training exercise.
I'll show them the power of my lasers!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance of suffering from fairy pranks[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]or[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% chance of befriending the fairies
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The city's garrison gains 10 XP[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points
After managing to make off with some food, the fairies seem to have settled down on their own, although the people of {1_City} are unhappy with their pranks.
Our willingness to tolerate the pranks and mischief of the fairies have endeared us to them, and they have revealed the location of their home.
We have sent out a garrison to deal with the troublesome fairies.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While they've come back a bit battered and bruised, they've at least gotten some basic combat experience.
Those fairies didn't know what hit them when you let loose with the Master Spark! You weren't even at full power!
Carnivorous Plants Discovered

Citizens of {1_City} have reported an infestation of carnivorous plants near their community. While carnivorous plants do grow in areas of the Forest of Magic, this infestation has made the area too dangerous for citizens to venture into. While this means we can't receive any resources from that particular area, it does also pose a hazard to any enemy forces that might try to travel through it.
Pay the citizens to clear out the plants on their own.
Send the garrison to destroy the plants.
This patch of carnivorous plants may be useful for us as they are.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR].
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The unit garrisoned in {1_City} takes 25 damage.
[ICON_BULLET]Carnivorous Plants appear near {1_City}, removing all yields from the tile but causing damage to any enemies nearby.
Enticed with a reward of gold, the local citizens have managed to clear away the carnivorous plants.
The soldiers have cleared out the carnivorous plants, although several were wounded.
The carnivorous plants remain near {1_City}, and our citizens have learned to stay away from them.
Steal the Precious Thing?
One of our agents has discovered a book in {1_Location} that may be of interest to you. It may cost a bit, but they could smuggle it out of the city before its owners even notice it missing.
I'll borrow that book, ze!
The book doesn't sound THAT interesting...
